title: From WBNA to VC: Alana Beard Talks Reality Check (Podcast)
itunes:title: From WBNA to VC: Alana Beard Talks Reality Check (Podcast)
description:
Former WNBA Champion and Four-time All-Star Alana Beard says her new job is a lot like being a rookie again. After 16 years in the league, she's moved to Silicon Valley and the world of venture capital and it's competitive in a very different way. She talks with Jason Kelly and Mike Lynch about her early business ventures (including a pizza joint) and reckoning as a Black woman with what may be a monumental moment in racial justice.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
